image:image.image:title: 6 Healthy Popcorn Seasonings & Toppings Perfect For Your Next Movie Night15
image:image.image:caption: Nothing says movie night like a bowl of fresh-popped popcorn. While popcorn can make a light, healthy snack, most popcorn seasonings and toppings are loaded with butter and salt. Plain popcorn can taste bland, so what can you do instead?
